hero.title: Frankencoin
hero.subtitle: In the last 50 years, the Swiss franc climbed more than 240% against the dollar. Frankencoin (ZCHF) brings this strength on chain as a collateralized, oracle-free stablecoin that tracks the Swiss franc.

features.title: Pay

features.description: Use your crypto to borrow Frankencoin at attractive terms.
